examples: I keep my dishes in the cupboard above the sink.
The cupboard was empty, except for a few cans of soup.

suggested: Why did the cupboard feel lonely? Because all of its friends were in the cabinet
The cupboard was once filled with memories, but now it stood empty and forgotten.
Trying to fit all your dishes in a small cupboard can be a real pain
When I opened the cupboard, I found a hidden stash of snacks.
The musty smell of an old cupboard
The rough texture of a wooden cupboard
The connection of family memories stored in a cupboard
